mapper.select: SELECT id AS stepId, rpa_action_id AS rpaActionId, step_order AS stepOrder, rpa_type AS rpaType, script_path AS scriptPath, script_file AS scriptFile, target_file_path AS targetFilePath, repeat_per_account AS repeatPerAccount, account_group_id AS accountGroupId, parallel_execution AS parallelExecution, frst_reg_user_id AS frstRegUserId, frst_reg_date AS frstRegDate, chg_reg_user_id AS chgRegUserId, chg_reg_date AS chgRegDate FROM rpa_step WHERE rpa_action_id = #{rpaActionId} ORDER BY step_order ASC
